meta_objectives.text: To empower effective community engagement and data-driven strategic planning for watershed resilience through the delivery of an interactive, automated digital game.

To solidify the Chiron Guild's leadership in civic technology by delivering an automated digital game that effectively educates stakeholders and generates actionable insights for sustainable infrastructure.

To pioneer a replicable model for interactive policy engagement by creating a scalable, automated digital game that translates complex systems into accessible learning experiences for diverse stakeholders.

To showcase the Chiron Guild's 'Precision Shell' by engineering a robust, automated digital game that revolutionizes stakeholder education on infrastructure management, thereby supplanting less effective traditional engagement methods.

project_sectors.sector_summary: Implement the fundamental game logic, rules engine, and automated calculations (such as water flow, O&M, and scoring) as defined in the V2.2 feature set.
project_sectors.alignment_with_meta_objectives: This directly supports the 'automated digital game' aspect critical to M1, M2, M3, and M4, forming the 'robust' engineering backbone (M4).

guild_ops.op_title: Formalize V2.2 Core Game Mechanics & Calculation Rules from Miro
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A comprehensive technical specification document translating Miro rules into pseudo-code/algorithmic descriptions.

guild_ops.op_title: Codify Core Game Data & Infrastructure Parameters (GameData Module)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`GameData.js`) containing all V2.2 static game data as constants.

guild_ops.op_title: Develop Game State Management Module (GameState Module)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`GameState.js`) for managing all dynamic game state properties, with unit tests.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Water Flow Simulation Logic (FlowPhase Module)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`FlowPhase.js`) accurately simulating the V2.2 Flow Phase, with unit tests.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Operations & Maintenance Calculation Logic (Maintenance Module)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`Maintenance.js`) correctly calculating O&M costs and applying penalties, with unit tests.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Game Scoring & Flood Point Tracking Logic (Scoring Module)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`Scoring.js`) for accurately calculating and tracking Flood Points, with unit tests.

guild_ops.op_title: Develop Core Game Loop Orchestration Logic
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: An initial JavaScript script/module (`GameEngineCore.js`) orchestrating the high-level game round sequence.

guild_ops.op_title: Verify Integrated Core Mechanics Engine Against V2.2 Rule Set
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A Quality Assurance test report documenting execution of game scenarios and confirming alignment with V2.2 rules via console/state inspection.

project_sectors.sector_summary: Develop the dynamic visual interface, interactive map, and user controls that allow players to engage intuitively with the game and receive real-time feedback.
project_sectors.alignment_with_meta_objectives: This enables 'interactive' engagement (M1, M3), 'educates stakeholders' (M2), and translates 'complex systems into accessible learning experiences' (M3).

guild_ops.op_title: Design UI Mockups & User Flow Schematics for Creek Connections
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A set of visual mockups for all key game screens and a user flow diagram illustrating player navigation.

guild_ops.op_title: Develop Interactive Watershed Map Renderer Component
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript component rendering the game's watershed map with user interaction capabilities.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Dynamic Infrastructure Placement & Upgrade Panel
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional UI component for displaying, selecting, and placing/upgrading infrastructure, updating GameState.

guild_ops.op_title: Develop Real-Time Game Status Display Components
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: Functional UI components for Scoreboard, Budget Tracker, and Round/Phase Tracker, updating in real-time from GameState.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Player Action Controls & Game Event Triggers
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: Functional UI buttons/controls for player actions that trigger game logic and update the UI.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Basic Visual Feedback for Game Events
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: Basic visual cues and animations for key game events (water flow, flood markers, penalty indicators).

guild_ops.op_title: Initial UI/UX Playability & Heuristic Evaluation
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A report detailing findings from an initial playability test and heuristic evaluation of the UI, identifying issues and improvements.

project_sectors.sector_summary: Implement the multi-phase campaign structure, manage game state across phases, and integrate all specific game content such as event cards and phase-specific objectives.
project_sectors.alignment_with_meta_objectives: This structures the 'learning experiences' (M3) and ensures the game effectively 'educates stakeholders' (M2) on 'infrastructure management' (M4) through a complete gameplay cycle.

guild_ops.op_title: Define Data Structures for Campaign Phases & Event Cards
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A technical document specifying data structures for multi-phase campaign progression and Event Card format/content.

guild_ops.op_title: Develop Campaign Management Logic
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module (`CampaignManager.js`) handling transitions between campaign phases and managing state.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Event Card System Logic
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional system to draw, present, and trigger effects of Event Cards.

guild_ops.op_title: Integrate All V2.2 Event Card Content
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: All defined V2.2 Event Card data fully encoded and integrated into the Event Card System.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Scenario & Phase Objective Display & Tracking
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: UI elements and underlying logic to display current phase objectives and track progress.

guild_ops.op_title: Develop Game State Persistence Mechanism (Client-Side)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional client-side mechanism (e.g., LocalStorage) to save and load campaign progress.

guild_ops.op_title: Test Full Campaign Playthrough & Phase Transitions
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A test report confirming successful execution of a full 3-phase campaign, validating transitions, rules, and objectives.

project_sectors.sector_summary: Establish robust systems for automatically collecting, storing, and enabling the export of player actions and game outcome data to support analysis and insights.
project_sectors.alignment_with_meta_objectives: This is crucial for 'data-driven strategic planning' (M1) and generating 'actionable insights' (M2), showcasing a tangible output beyond just the game itself.

guild_ops.op_title: Define Data Schema for Player Actions & Game Outcomes Logging
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A specification document detailing the schema for logged data (actions, events, outcomes).

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Player Action & Game Event Logging System
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A functional JavaScript module that automatically logs defined player actions and game events.

guild_ops.op_title: Develop Game Outcome Recording Mechanism
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: Functionality to capture and store the final state of a completed game (scores, budget, win/loss status).

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Client-Side Data Export Feature (JSON/CSV)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A user-triggered feature to download aggregated gameplay data and outcomes as JSON or CSV.

guild_ops.op_title: Verify Data Logging Integrity & Export Accuracy
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A test report confirming correct logging of actions/events, accurate outcome recording, and well-formed data exports.

project_sectors.sector_summary: Refine the game through comprehensive testing, ensure adherence to accessibility standards for broader public use, and prepare the application for stable web-based deployment.
project_sectors.alignment_with_meta_objectives: This ensures 'effective community engagement' (M1) through a polished and 'accessible' (M3) product, solidifying 'Chiron Guild's leadership' (M2) and showcasing the 'Precision Shell' (M4) through a high-quality deliverable.

guild_ops.op_title: Conduct Cross-Browser & Device Compatibility Testing
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A test report detailing game performance and visual consistency across specified browsers and devices, identifying bugs.

guild_ops.op_title: Implement Foundational Web Accessibility Features (WCAG AA)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: Game interface updated with key accessibility features (keyboard navigation, ARIA, color contrast) aiming for WCAG 2.1 AA.

guild_ops.op_title: Perform Code & Asset Performance Optimization
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: Optimized game code and assets resulting in improved load times, smoother animations, and reduced overhead.

guild_ops.op_title: Compile Comprehensive User Guide & Gameplay Instructions
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A user-friendly guide detailing how to play, rules, UI, objectives, and campaign structure.

guild_ops.op_title: Coordinate & Analyze External User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A summary report of feedback from external UAT, focusing on usability, clarity, engagement, learning, and bugs.

guild_ops.op_title: Create Deployment Package & Documentation
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A production-ready build of the web application and documentation for deploying to a standard web hosting platform.

guild_ops.op_title: Define Initial Deployment & Hosting Strategy
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: A document outlining recommended hosting, deployment process, and initial monitoring/maintenance.

guild_ops.op_title: Final Accessibility Compliance Audit & Remediation
guild_ops.primary_deliverable: An audit report verifying accessibility implementation against WCAG guidelines, with record of remediations.
